The weirdest thing about Kamala’s and Sleepy Joe’s response regarding Hurricane Helene is that they cannot even pretend to care when the election is right around the corner. So while it’s unsurprising they did nothing significant this weekend for the people of North Carolina, you would think they would at least act like they are doing something but the best they could be bothered to do was pretend to sign blank papers and lie about taking a phone call at the beach.

Their lack of a response was so abysmal that Scott Jennings called them out.
title: Watch: Even CNN is torching Kamala's, Biden's pathetic hurricane response this weekend

A Minnesota food pantry has banned White people from its establishment, claiming the “resources” are for Black & Indigenous Folx" only. It’s unclear what the difference between “folks” and “folx” is but this may or may not be illegal.

Minnesota food pantry bans white people, says "resources" are only for "Black & Indigenous Folx"https://t.co/CnL7DNstyT
— The Post Millennial (@TPostMillennial)
title: White people banned from food Pantry in Tim Walz's Minnesota: "For black & Indigenous folx only"

We're approaching the last month before the latest, most important election day of our lifetimes. This is the part where polls start to resemble Rorschach tests. You can see whatever you want in them. Plus, there are so many topline results that function as little more than clickbait. The trendlines are what's hot, and Kamala Harris is trending to have the WORST performance with union workers that any Democrat has had since 1984.

You know, the year when the Republican candidate won every state except for Minnesota.

title: Watch: Kamala Harris looks to have the WORST performance with crucial Dem voting bloc since 1984
